narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Pantherx Specialty LLC is a Pharmacy provider based in Coraopolis, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $7.7M in Medicaid payments across 484 claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $7.7M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
